nodes.text: Hagrana Memuna was a female Sullustan, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Memuna was a student at the Blue Star Centre, a philosophical center that was located in the city of Gadrin, on Cularin. In about 32 BBY, Memuna was arrested after she protested against a decision made by Governor Barnab Chistor, by uprooting all the flowers in his garden and replanting them on the edge of the city.
